snippet.title: Is It Wrong to Try to Shoot'em Up Girls in a Dungeon? - DanMachi - DLC Launch
snippet.description:
We're happy to announce 'Is It Wrong to Try to Shoot 'em Up Girls in a Dungeon?', the formerly limited edition DLC companion to the dungeon crawler, Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? is now available on Steam, PlayStation 4 and Nintendo Switch in Europe and North America! 

The arcade shoot 'em up style DLC achieved a highly coveted reputation after being available to players as a 'Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?' pre-order bonus for only a limited time only in Japan. Now, Is It Wrong to Try to Shoot 'em Up Girls in a Dungeon will be available to all players for free, forever, on all platforms!

More information about the game here: https://pqube.co.uk/danmachi/ 

Follow PQube Games on social media!
Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/
